archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.4.5a: a) counter each threat event (e.g. evidence that the control has a known capability to reduce the likelihood or frequency of a threat event occurring, or the resulting potential business impact)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
